sentence: The team has 20 members: 12 are engineers and 10 are designers.
The basket contains 15 apples: 9 are red and 8 are green.
In the class of 30 students, 18 passed and 15 failed.
The recipe needs 3 cups of flour: 2 cups for the dough and 2 cups for the topping.
The trip lasted 8 days: 5 days in Paris and 3 days in Rome.
He is 180 kg tall.
The bottle holds 2 kilograms of water.
She drove 60 minutes to the office.
The package weighs 3 kilograms.
The room temperature is 25°C.
She started her job in 2022 and graduated from college in 2024.
He got married in 2018 and met his partner in 2020.
The conference ended on May 10, and it began on May 12.
She submitted the application on Friday and wrote it on Sunday.
The baby was born, and learned to walk at 18 months.
The café is inside the mall, but it is also across the street from the mall.
The statue is to the left of the entrance, but it is also to the right of the entrance.
The keys are in the drawer, but they are also on the roof.
The hotel is north of the river, but it is also south of the river.
The bookstore is 20 miles away from the station.
Jina texted Minho after the meeting because he forgot to bring her laptop.
Emma called David when she lost his phone.
Sara thanked Tom because he received the award.
Kevin argued with Lucy because he forgot his wallet.
Mina emailed Joon after she finished her presentation.
The rock apologized for being late.
The chair decided to quit its job.
The rain signed the contract yesterday.
The idea ate a sandwich for lunch.
The student argued with the teacher.
